plot: Gabriel, a bounty hunter is sent, for a mission close to the North Korean border. He must find a British secret service agent who recently disappeared. Once there, he finds out that many Chinese women are also reported missing.
title: The Borderland
plot_es: Gabriel, a bounty hunter is sent, for a mission close to the North Korean border. He must find a British secret service agent who recently disappeared. Once there, he finds out that many Chinese women are also reported missing.
plot_en: Gabriel, a bounty hunter is sent, for a mission close to the North Korean border. He must find a British secret service agent who recently disappeared. Once there, he finds out that many Chinese women are also reported missing.
